TITLE: Flip your videos online
META: Easiest way to flip your videos online.
LABEL: DOCX to PDF

TEXTUAL_CONTENT.content: Our website is platform independent. It works on both Window and iOS Operating systems and can be used without any downloads required.
The conversion is absolutely free, so you can convert as many files as you want.
You can use this application from now on any operating system, like Windows/Mac/Linux/Android/iPhone.
There is no server involved and hence your video is safe
Video editing is really fast and you can get your job done in no time
The application works completely on your browser without invlolving any server.Hence your data is safe

HOW_TO_CONTENT.heading: How to flip your video
steps: Wait patiently till the video gets uploaded
Select the flip option of your choice
Click on save to download your video

FAQ.question: Can I use both flip X and flip Y simultaneously?
FAQ.answer: Yes, Flip video allows you to flip your windows in multiple ways, and you can use both Flip X and Flip Y, multiple times, until your video has been flipped to your liking.

FAQ.question: Why is it taking so long to process my file?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to flip and process your video depend on the size, aspect ratio and the number of flips you have performed. If your file size is bigger, it will take a bit longer than regular files.

FAQ.question: Is Flip Video safe to use?
FAQ.answer: Flip Video is one of the safest and most secure free online tools. It is absolutely trouble-free and does its job perfectly well. At the same time, it does not save any of the user data.

FAQ.question: How long will it take to upload my video?
FAQ.answer: The time taken to upload your video for cropping or editing depends on the size of your video. Better quality videos with higher resolution will take more time to upload as compared to low quality videos with lesser resolution.

FAQ.question: Will the quality of my videos decrease after flipping?
FAQ.answer: No, the quality of the video remains as is it before flipping the video. Both horizontal and vertical flip does not affect the quality of your videos and it will be as when uploaded.

FAQ.question: How can I flip multiple videos?
FAQ.answer: Flip Video allows you to flip multiple files, one after the other. When you flip one file and click on save, the video will be processed. After the video has been processes, you can see download option on the screen. By clicking on it you can download the flipped file. In order to flip another video, you only need to refresh the browser and you will see upload video option. Now you can again select your file which you want to flip.

FAQ.question: I refreshed the browser by mistake. What do I do?
FAQ.answer: Since our website does not use any servers, and does not store your data, the file that you have uploaded, will not be saved. You need to reupload the file to flip it.

FAQ.question: Will I be charged to use the website?
FAQ.answer: Our website is absolutely free and you can use it as many times as you want. There are no free trial uses, after which you will have to pay for using our services. We won't charge you anything.

FAQ.question: Will I have to create an account to use Flip Video?
FAQ.answer: Our website does not require you to sign up or create an account. The platform is absolutely free and you can compress as many files as you want.

FAQ.question: Will my uploaded files be saved on the server?
FAQ.answer: Our website works on a cloud server and does not save your files. Your files will be completely safe with you after you have compressed your file.

FAQ.question: Does it support both Android and iOS platforms?
FAQ.answer: Yes, our website works on browser, and therefore supports both iOS and Android platforms

FAQ.question: Which Windows versions does Flip Video support?
FAQ.answer: Flip video is completely web-based and therefore provides cross-platform support. This means that our tool supports all versions of Windows. It not only works on Windows operating system but can work on any other operating system, that supports a browser.

Most unopened items in new condition and returned within 90 days will receive a refund or exchange. Some items have a modified return policy noted on the receipt or packing slip. mainEntity.name: How long does it take to process a refund?

acceptedAnswer.text: We will reimburse you for returned items in the same way you paid for them. For example, any amounts deducted from a gift card will be credited back to a gift card. For returns by mail, once we receive your return, we will process it within 4â€“5 business days. It may take up to 7 days after we process the return to reflect in your account, depending on your financial institution's processing time.

mainEntity.name: What is the policy for late/non-delivery of items ordered online?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Our local teams work diligently to make sure that your order arrives on time, within our normaldelivery hours of 9AM to 8PM in the recipient's time zone. During busy holiday periods like Christmas, Valentine's and Mother's Day, we may extend our delivery hours before 9AM and after 8PM to ensure that all gifts are delivered on time. If for any reason your gift does not arrive on time, our dedicated Customer Service agents will do everything they can to help successfully resolve your issue.

Click here to complete the form with your order-related question(s).

mainEntity.name: When will my credit card be charged?

acceptedAnswer.text: We'll attempt to securely charge your credit card at the point of purchase online. If there's a problem, you'll be notified on the spot and prompted to use another card. Once we receive verification of sufficient funds, your payment will be completed and transferred securely to us. Your account will be charged in 24 to 48 hours.

mainEntity.name: Will I be charged sales tax for online orders?

acceptedAnswer.text:
Local and State sales tax will be collected if your recipient's mailing address is in:
  • Arizona
  • California
  • Colorado
